author: Stahly
description:
A first on Tale of Painters! After the Ultramarines release kicked off the blue weeks here on the blog, I thought I’d share my very first Gundam: the RX-78-2 SD Cross Silhouette in the limited blue monochrome colour scheme, exclusive to The Gundam Base stores. In this post, I’ll talk about my experience with this kit compared to Warhammer model kits.

The post Showcase: The Gundam Base Limited RX-78-2 Gundam SD Cross Silhouette appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: The Gundam Base Limited RX-78-2 Gundam SD Cross Silhouette
